name: the Answers [Puzzle] Shop
description:
The Answers Stop is now open for business!

A place in which people come to get answers, from you!

Boss is out on vacations this month so your new part time job is helping the customers while she is out. Every day there's a new request in the form of a puzzle!

This game is a #devtober, every day during October theres going to be a new puzzle for you to play!

@calixjumio
